restartRequired.body: √â necess√°rio reiniciar para aplicar esta altera√ß√£o

restartRequired.plugins: Os seguintes plugins requerem uma reinicializa√ß√£o:

settings.title: Configura√ß√µes

transparent.description: Torne a janela do Discord transparente. √â necess√°rio um tema que suporte transpar√™ncia, caso contr√°rio, esta op√ß√£o n√£o ter√° efeito.
transparent.title: Ativar transpar√™ncia de janela

transparent.note: Isso impedir√° que a janela seja redimensionada.

useQuickCss.description: Carregue CSS personalizado do editor QuickCSS. Isso permite que voc√™ personalize a apar√™ncia do Discord com seus pr√≥prios estilos.
useQuickCss.title: Habilitar CSS personalizado

winCtrlQ.title: Registrar Ctrl+Q como atalho para fechar o Discord
winCtrlQ.description: Adicione Ctrl+Q como um atalho de teclado para fechar o Discord. Isso fornece uma alternativa ao Alt+F4 para fechar rapidamente o aplicativo.

winNativeTitleBar.title: Use a barra de t√≠tulo nativa do Windows em vez da barra personalizada do Discord
winNativeTitleBar.description: Substitua a barra de t√≠tulo personalizada do Discord pela barra de t√≠tulo padr√£o do Windows. Isso pode melhorar a compatibilidade com algumas ferramentas de gerenciamento de janelas.

notifyReviews.description: Notify about new reviews on startup

showWarning.description: Display warning to be respectful at the top of the reviews list

reviewDB.newReviews: You have new reviews on your profile!
reviewDB.confirmDelete: Do you really want to delete this review?
reviewDB.mustBeLoggedInDelete: You must be logged in to delete reviews.
reviewDB.confirmReport: Do you really want to report this review?
reviewDB.mustBeLoggedInReport: You must be logged in to report reviews.
reviewDB.confirmBlock: Do you really want to block this user? They will be unable to leave further reviews on your profile. You can unblock users in the plugin settings.
reviewDB.mustBeLoggedInBlock: You must be logged in to block users.
reviewDB.notLoggedIn: You are not logged into ReviewDB!

autoTranslateEnabled.title: Equicord Auto-Translate Enabled
autoTranslateEnabled.body: You just enabled Auto Translate! Any message <0>will automatically be translated</0> before being sent.

voiceMessages.failedToParse: Failed to parse selected audio file: {error}
voiceMessages.iosWarning: Voice Messages have to be OggOpus to be playable on iOS. This file is <0>{type}</0> so it will not be playable on iOS.
voiceMessages.iosFix: To fix it, first convert it to OggOpus, for example using the <0>convertio web converter</0>
voiceMessages.sending: Now sending voice message... Please be patient

showHiddenChannels.cannotSeeMessages: You can not see the {type} of this channel.
showHiddenChannels.seeGuidelines: However you may see its guidelines:
showHiddenChannels.requireTag: Posts on this forum require a tag to be set.

settings.collapseDeleted: Whether to collapse deleted messages, similar to blocked messages
settings.inlineEdits: Whether to display edit history as part of message content
settings.ignoreBots: Whether to ignore messages by bots
settings.ignoreSelf: Whether to ignore messages by yourself
settings.ignoreUsers: Comma-separated list of user IDs to ignore
settings.ignoreChannels: Comma-separated list of channel IDs to ignore
settings.ignoreGuilds: Comma-separated list of guild IDs to ignore
settings.showEditDiffs: Show visual differences between edited message versions
settings.separatedDiffs: Separate addition and removals in diffs for a more readable differential

messageLogger.notLoggedTooltip: This edit state was not logged so it can't be displayed.

clientTheme.themeColorDescription: Add a color to your Discord client theme
clientTheme.contrastWarning: Selected color won't contrast well with text

textReplace.scope.myMessages: Apply to your messages (visible to everyone)
textReplace.scope.othersMessages: Apply to others' messages (only visible to you)

expressionCloner.nameValidation: Name must be between 2 and 32 characters

fakeProfileThemes.instructions: Set your profile colors using the color pickers below. The colors will be encoded into your profile's 'About Me' section.

validation.maxLength: Must be not longer than {length} characters.
validation.discordId: Must be a valid Discord ID.
validation.streamingLink: Streaming link must be a valid URL.
validation.streamingLinkLength: Streaming link must be not longer than 512 characters.
validation.discordLink: Don't use a Discord link. Use an Imgur image link instead.
validation.imgurDirect: Imgur link must be a direct link to the image (e.g. https://i.imgur.com/...). Right click the image and click 'Copy image address'
validation.tenorDirect: Tenor link must be a direct link to the image (e.g. https://media.tenor.com/...). Right click the GIF and click 'Copy image address'

customRPC.streamLink: Stream Link (Twitch or YouTube, only if activity type is Streaming)

timestampModes.currentTime: Same as your current time (not reset after 24h)

notice.title: Notice
notice.body: Activity Sharing isn't enabled, people won't be able to see your custom rich presence!

instructions.devPortal: Go to the <0>Discord Developer Portal</0> to create an application and get the application ID.
instructions.uploadImages: Upload images in the Rich Presence tab to get the image keys.
instructions.imgur: If you want to use an image link, download your image and reupload the image to <0>Imgur</0> and get the image link by right-clicking the image and selecting "Copy image address".
instructions.buttons: You can't see your own buttons on your profile, but everyone else can see it fine.
instructions.unicode: Some weird unicode text ("fonts" ùñëùñéùñêùñä ùñôùñçùñéùñò) may cause the rich presence to not show up, try using normal letters instead.

settings.backgroundCheck: Check for new sessions in the background, and display notifications when they are detected
settings.checkInterval: How often to check for new sessions in the background (if enabled), in minutes

settings.organizeMenu: Organizes the settings cog context menu into categories
settings.eagerLoad: Removes the loading delay when opening the menu for the first time

settings.toolTip: Show member count on the server tooltip
settings.memberList: Show member count in the member list
settings.voiceActivity: Show voice activity with member count in the member list

settings.sidebar: Display servers from folder on dedicated sidebar
settings.closeAllFolders: Close all folders when selecting a server not in a folder
settings.closeAllHomeButton: Close all folders when clicking on the home button
settings.closeOthers: Close other folders when opening a folder
settings.closeServerFolder: Close folder when selecting a server in that folder
settings.forceOpen: Force a folder to open when switching to a server of that folder
settings.keepIcons: Keep showing guild icons in the primary guild bar folder when it's open in the BetterFolders sidebar
settings.showFolderIcon: Show the folder icon above the folder guilds in the BetterFolders sidebar
settings.folderIconMultipleExpanded: When more than one folder is expanded

settingsAbout.title: How to use arRPC
settingsAbout.description: Follow the instructions in the GitHub repo to get the server running, and then enable the plugin.

arRPC.connectionFailed: Failed to connect to arRPC, is it running?

vcNarrator.description: Announces when users join, leave, or move voice channels via narrator
vcNarrator.linuxVoicesHelp: Install speech-dispatcher or espeak and run Discord with the --enable-speech-dispatcher flag
vcNarrator.osVoicesHelp: Try installing some in the Narrator settings of your Operating System
vcNarrator.noEnglishVoices: You don't have any English voices installed, so the narrator might sound weird
vcNarrator.customiseMessages: You can customise the spoken messages below. You can disable specific messages by setting them to nothing
vcNarrator.placeholdersHelp: The special placeholders <0>{{USER}}</0>, <1>{{DISPLAY_NAME}}</1>, <2>{{NICKNAME}}</2> and <3>{{CHANNEL}}</3> will be replaced with the user's name (nothing if it's yourself), the user's display name, the user's nickname on current server and the channel's name respectively
vcNarrator.speechSynthesisNotSupported: SpeechSynthesis not supported or no Narrator voices found. Thus, this plugin will not work. Check my Settings for more info

settings.latinOnly: Strip non latin characters from names before saying them

viewIcons.description: Makes avatars and banners in user profiles clickable, adds View Icon/Banner entries in the user, server and group channel context menu.

settings.formatDescription: Choose the image format to use for non animated images. Animated images will always use .gif

viewRaw.description: Copy and view the raw content/data of any message, channel or guild

settings.clickMethodDescription: Change the button to view the raw content/data of any message.
settings.leftClick: Left Click to view the raw content.
settings.rightClick: Right click to view the raw content.

viewRaw.copyRawLeftViewRawRight: Copy Raw (Left Click) / View Raw (Right Click)
viewRaw.viewRawLeftCopyRawRight: View Raw (Left Click) / Copy Raw (Right Click)

decor.description: Create and use your own custom avatar decorations, or pick your favorite from the presets.
decor.enableAndRestart: Enable Decor and restart your client to change your avatar decoration.
decor.accessFromProfiles: You can also access Decor decorations from the {link} page.
decor.title: Decor

quickMention.description: Adds a quick mention button to the message actions bar
quickMention.label: Quick Mention

settings.anonymiseByDefault: Whether to anonymise file names by default

settings.permissionsSortOrder: The sort method used for defining which role grants a user a certain permission

settings.pinOrder: Which order should pinned DMs be displayed in?
settings.canCollapseDmSection: Allow uncategorised DMs section to be collapsable

settings.saveZoomValues: Whether to save zoom and lens size values
settings.nearestNeighbour: Use Nearest Neighbour Interpolation when scaling images
settings.zoomSpeed: How fast the zoom / lens size changes

settings.notices: Also show a notice at the top of your screen when removed (use this if you don't want to miss any notifications).
settings.offlineRemovals: Notify you when starting discord if you were removed while offline.
settings.friends: Notify when a friend removes you
settings.friendRequestCancels: Notify when a friend request is cancelled
settings.servers: Notify when removed from a server
settings.groups: Notify when removed from a group chat

relationshipNotifier.friendRequestRemoved: A friend request from {username} has been removed.
relationshipNotifier.serverRemoved: You were removed from the server {name}.
relationshipNotifier.groupRemoved: You were removed from the group {name}.

settings.latency: Threshold in seconds for latency indicator
settings.ignoreSelf: Don't add indicator to your own messages

messageLatency.oldDiscordAndroid: User is suspected to be on an old Discord Android client
messageLatency.messageDelayed: This message was sent with a delay of {delta}.

userVoiceShow.description: Shows an indicator when a user is in a Voice Channel

settings.showInUserProfileModal: Show a user's Voice Channel indicator in their profile next to the name
settings.showInMemberList: Show a user's Voice Channel indicator in the member and DMs list
settings.showInMessages: Show a user's Voice Channel indicator in messages

userVoiceShow.cannotJoinChannel: You cannot join the user's Voice Channel

callTimer.description: Add call timers for all users in voice channels and in the connection status.

settings.allCallTimers: Add call timer to all users in a server voice channel
settings.showWithoutHover: Always show the timer without needing to hover
settings.showRoleColor: Show the user's role color (if this plugin is enabled)
settings.watchLargeGuilds: Track users in large guilds. This may cause lag if you're in a lot of large guilds with active voice users. Tested with up to 2000 active voice users with no issues.

fakeNitro.description: Allows you to send fake emojis/stickers, use nitro themes, and stream in nitro quality

settings.enableEmojiBypass: Allows sending fake emojis (also bypasses missing permission to use custom emojis)
settings.emojiSize: Size of the emojis when sending
settings.transformEmojis: Whether to transform fake emojis into real ones
settings.enableStickerBypass: Allows sending fake stickers (also bypasses missing permission to use stickers)
settings.stickerSize: Size of the stickers when sending
settings.transformStickers: Whether to transform fake stickers into real ones
settings.transformCompoundSentence: Whether to transform fake stickers and emojis in compound sentences (sentences with more content than just the fake emoji or sticker link)
settings.useStickerHyperLinks: Whether to use hyperlinks when sending fake stickers
settings.useEmojiHyperLinks: Whether to use hyperlinks when sending fake emojis
settings.hyperLinkText: What text the hyperlink should use. {{NAME}} will be replaced with the emoji/sticker name.
settings.disableEmbedPermissionCheck: Whether to disable the embed permission check when sending fake emojis and stickers

fakeNitro.stickerNotice: This is a FakeNitro sticker and renders like a real sticker only for you. Appears as a link to non-plugin users.
fakeNitro.emojiNotice: This is a FakeNitro emoji and renders like a real emoji only for you. Appears as a link to non-plugin users.

noEmbedPerms.body1: You are trying to send/edit a message that contains a FakeNitro emoji or sticker,
noEmbedPerms.body2: however you do not have permissions to embed links in the current channel.
noEmbedPerms.body3: Are you sure you want to send this message? Your FakeNitro items will appear as a link only.
noEmbedPerms.disableNotice: You can disable this notice in the plugin settings.

noAttachmentPerms.body: You cannot send this message because it contains an animated FakeNitro sticker, and you do not have permissions to attach files in the current channel. Please remove the sticker to proceed.

serverListIndicators.description: Add online friend count or server count in the server list

settings.modeBoth: Both server and online friend counts
settings.useCompact: Makes the indicator appear with only text

friendsSince.description: Shows when you became friends with someone in the user popout
friendsSince.heading: Friends Since

silentMessageToggle.description: Adds a button to the chat bar to toggle sending a silent message.

settings.persistState: How to persist the silent message toggle state
settings.autoDisable: Automatically disable the silent message toggle again after sending one

sendTimestamps.description: Send timestamps easily via chat box button & text shortcuts. Read the extended description!

extendedDescription.quickSend: To quickly send time-only timestamps, include timestamps formatted as `HH:MM` (including the backticks!) in your message
extendedDescription.seeBelow: See below for examples. If you need anything more specific, use the Date button in the chat bar!

gameActivityToggle.description: Adds a button next to the mic and deafen button to toggle game activity.

settings.oldIcon: Use the old icon style before Discord icon redesign
settings.location: Where to show the game activity toggle button

lastfmRichPresence.description: Little plugin for Last.fm rich presence

settings.apiKey: Custom Last.fm API key. Not required but highly recommended to avoid rate limiting with our shared key
settings.clickableLinks: Make track, artist and album names clickable links
settings.hideWithSpotify: Hide Last.fm presence if spotify is running
settings.hideWithActivity: Hide Last.fm presence if you have any other presence
settings.statusDisplayType: Show the track / artist name in the member list
settings.nameFormat: Show name of song and artist in status name
settings.missingArt: When album or album art is missing
settings.showLastFmLogo: Show the Last.fm logo by the album cover

nameFormat.albumName: Use album name (falls back to custom status text if song has no album)

lastfmRichPresence.howToCreateApiKey: How to create an API key
lastfmRichPresence.apiKeyInstructions: Set <0>Application name</0> and <1>Application description</1> to anything and leave the rest blank.

experiments.description: Enable Access to Experiments & other dev-only features in Discord!

settings.toolbarDevMenu: Change the Help (?) toolbar button (top right in chat) to Discord's developer menu

experiments.devToolsInfo: You can open Discord's DevTools via {keyboardCombo}
experiments.warning1: Experiments are unreleased Discord features. They might not work, or even break your client or get your account disabled.
experiments.warning2: Only use experiments if you know what you're doing. Equicord is not responsible for any damage caused by enabling experiments. If you don't know what an experiment does, ignore it. Do not ask us what experiments do either, we probably don't know.
experiments.warning3: No, you cannot use server-side features like checking the "Send to Client" box.

typingTweaks.description: Show avatars and role colours in the typing indicator

settings.showAvatars: Show avatars in the typing indicator
settings.showRoleColors: Show role colors in the typing indicator
settings.alternativeFormatting: Show a more useful message when several users are typing
settings.amITyping: Shows you if other people can see you typing

biggerStreamPreview.name: BiggerStreamPreview
biggerStreamPreview.description: This plugin allows you to enlarge stream previews

betterRoleContext.name: BetterRoleContext
betterRoleContext.description: Adds options to copy role color / edit role / view role icon when right clicking roles in the user profile

settings.roleIconFileFormat: File format to use when viewing role icons

readAllNotificationsButton.name: ReadAllNotificationsButton
readAllNotificationsButton.description: Read all server notifications with a single button click!

previewMessage.name: PreviewMessage
previewMessage.description: Lets you preview your message before sending it.

pauseInvitesForever.name: PauseInvitesForever
pauseInvitesForever.description: Brings back the option to pause invites indefinitely that stupid Discord removed.

overrideForumDefaults.name: OverrideForumDefaults
overrideForumDefaults.description: Allows you to override default forum layout/sort order. you can still change it on a per-channel basis

settings.defaultLayout: Which layout to use as default
settings.defaultSortOrder: Which sort order to use as default

fixImagesQuality.name: FixImagesQuality
fixImagesQuality.description: Improves quality of images by loading them at their original resolution

settings.originalImagesInChat: Also load the original image in Chat. WARNING: Read the caveats above

fixImagesQuality.defaultBehavior: The default behavior is the following:
fixImagesQuality.inChatOptimised: In chat, optimised but full resolution images will be loaded.
fixImagesQuality.inModalOriginal: In the image modal, the original image will be loaded.
fixImagesQuality.enableOriginalCaveats: You can also enable original image in chat, but beware of the following caveats:
fixImagesQuality.animatedImagesAlways: Animated images (GIF, WebP, etc.) in chat will always animate, regardless of if the App is focused.

favGifSearch.name: FavoriteGifSearch
favGifSearch.description: Adds a search bar to favorite gifs.

settings.searchOption: The part of the url you want to search

consoleJanitor.name: ConsoleJanitor

settings.disableSpotifyLogger: Disable the Spotify logger, which leaks account information and access token
settings.whitelistedLoggers: Semi colon separated list of loggers to allow even if others are hidden

consoleJanitor.alwaysAllowLoggers: Always allow loggers of these types

appleMusicRichPresence.name: AppleMusicRichPresence
appleMusicRichPresence.description: Discord rich presence for your Apple Music!

settings.statusDisplayType: Show the track / artist name in the member list
settings.enableTimestamps: Whether or not to enable timestamps
settings.enableButtons: Whether or not to enable buttons
settings.largeTextString: Activity assets large text format string
settings.smallTextString: Activity assets small text format string

settingsAbout.intro: For the customizable activity format strings, you can use several special strings to include track data in activities!
settingsAbout.namePlaceholder: {name} is replaced with the track name
settingsAbout.artistPlaceholder: {artist} is replaced with the artist(s)' name(s)
settingsAbout.albumPlaceholder: {album} is replaced with the album name.

reverseImageSearch.name: ReverseImageSearch
reverseImageSearch.description: Adds ImageSearch to image context menus

seeSummaries.name: Summaries
seeSummaries.description: Enables Discord's experimental Summaries feature on every server, displaying AI generated summaries of conversations

settings.summaryExpiryThresholdDays: The time in days before a summary is removed. Note that only up to 50 summaries are kept per channel

greetStickerPicker.description: Allows you to use any greet sticker instead of only the random one by right-clicking the 'Wave to say hi!' button

accountPanelServerProfile.description: Right click your account panel in the bottom left to view your profile in the current server
accountPanelServerProfile.prioritizeServerProfileDescription: Prioritize Server Profile when left clicking your account panel

xsOverlay.description: Forwards discord notifications to XSOverlay, for easy viewing in VR
xsOverlay.preferUDPDescription: Enable if you use an older build of XSOverlay unable to connect through websockets. This setting is ignored on web.
xsOverlay.testNotification: This is a test notification! explode

unsuppressEmbeds.description: Allows you to unsuppress embeds in messages

showTimeoutDuration.description: Shows how much longer a user's timeout will last, either in the timeout icon tooltip or next to it
showTimeoutDuration.displayStyleDescription: How to display the timeout duration

copyFileContents.description: Adds a button to text file attachments to copy their contents

dearrow.description: Makes YouTube embed titles and thumbnails less sensationalist, powered by Dearrow
dearrow.dearrowedClickRestore: This embed has been dearrowed, click to restore
dearrow.hideButton: Hides the Dearrow button from YouTube embeds
dearrow.replaceElementsDescription: Choose which elements of the embed will be replaced

copyUserURLs.description: Adds a 'Copy User URL' option to the user context menu.

copyStickerLinks.description: Adds the ability to copy & open Sticker links

copyEmojiMarkdown.description: Allows you to copy emojis as formatted string (<:blobcatcozy:1026533070955872337>)
copyEmojiMarkdown.copyUnicodeDescription: Copy the raw unicode character instead of :name: for default emojis (üëΩ)

voiceDownload.description: Adds a download to voice messages. (Opens a new browser tab)

usrbg.description: Displays user banners from USRBG, allowing anyone to get a banner without Nitro

settings.nitroFirst: Banner to use if both Nitro and USRBG banners are present
settings.voiceBackground: Use USRBG banners as voice chat backgrounds

typingIndicator.description: Adds an indicator if someone is typing on a channel.

settings.includeCurrentChannel: Whether to show the typing indicator for the currently selected channel
settings.includeMutedChannels: Whether to show the typing indicator for muted channels.
settings.includeIgnoredUsers: Whether to show the typing indicator for ignored users.
settings.includeBlockedUsers: Whether to show the typing indicator for blocked users.
settings.indicatorMode: How should the indicator be displayed?

sortFriendRequests.description: Sorts friend requests by date of receipt

showConnections.description: Show connected accounts in user popouts

replaceGoogleSearch.description: Replaces the Google search with different Engine(s)

settings.customEngineName: Name of the custom search engine
settings.replacementEngine: Replace with a specific search engine instead of adding a menu

pictureInPicture.description: Adds picture in picture to videos (next to the Download button)

settings.loop: Whether to make the PiP video loop or not

settings.userList: List of users to allow or exempt pings for (separated by commas or spaces)
settings.roleList: List of roles to allow or exempt pings for (separated by commas or spaces)
settings.doNotPingListed: Do not ping the listed users / roles
settings.onlyPingListed: Only ping the listed users / roles
settings.inverseShiftReply: Invert Discord's shift replying behaviour (enable to make shift reply mention user)

hideAttachments.description: Hide attachments and embeds for individual messages via hover button

showMeYourName.modalDescription: Set a custom SMYN nickname for this user. Make use of it by specifying {custom} in the SMYN template settings.

settings.messages: Display custom name format in messages.
settings.replies: Display custom name format in replies.
settings.mentions: Display custom name format in mentions.
settings.memberList: Display the first available name listed in your custom name format in the member list.
settings.profilePopout: Display the first available name listed in your custom name format in profile popouts.
settings.voiceChannels: Display the first available name listed in your custom name format in voice channels.
settings.reactions: Display the first available name listed in your custom name format in reaction tooltips, and the full name in reaction popouts.
settings.discriminators: Append discriminators to usernames for bots. Discriminators were deprecated for users, but are still used for bots. By default, a bot's username is equivalent to a user's global name, therefore multiple bots can have the same username. Appending discriminators makes them unique again.
settings.hideDefaultAtSign: Hide the default "@" symbol before the name in mentions and replies. Only applied if either feature is enabled.
settings.truncateAllNamesWithStreamerMode: Truncate all names, not just usernames, while in Streamer Mode.
settings.removeDuplicates: If any of the names are equivalent, remove them, leaving only the unique names.
settings.ignoreFonts: For the non-primary names, use Discord's default fonts regardless of the user's custom nitro font.
settings.ignoreGradients: For the non-primary names, if the role has a gradient, ignore it in favor of the color set below.
settings.animateGradients: For the non-primary names, if the role has a gradient, animate it. This is disabled by "Ignore Gradients" and reduced motion.
settings.nameSeparator: The separator to use between names. The default is a single space.
settings.includedNames: The order to display usernames, display names, nicknames, friend names, and custom names. Use the following placeholders: {user}, {display}, {nick}, {friend}, {custom}. You can provide multiple name options to use as fallbacks if one is unavailable by separating them with commas as such: {custom, friend, nick}. You can have up to three prefixes and three suffixes per name.
settings.customNameColor: The color to use for the custom name you assigned a user if it's not the first displayed. Leave blank for default. Accepts hex(a), rgb(a), or hsl(a) input. Use "Role" to follow the user's top role color. Use "Role+-#" to adjust the brightness by that percentage (ex: "Role+15")
settings.friendNameColor: The color to use for a friend's nickname if it's not the first displayed. Leave blank for default. Accepts hex(a), rgb(a), or hsl(a) input. Use "Role" to follow the user's top role color. Use "Role+-#" to adjust the brightness by that percentage (ex: "Role+15")
settings.nicknameColor: The color to use for the nickname if it's not the first displayed. Leave blank for default. Accepts hex(a), rgb(a), or hsl(a) input. Use "Role" to follow the user's top role color. Use "Role+-#" to adjust the brightness by that percentage (ex: "Role+15")
settings.displayNameColor: The color to use for the display name if it's not the first displayed. Leave blank for default. Accepts hex(a), rgb(a), or hsl(a) input. Use "Role" to follow the user's top role color. Use "Role+-#" to adjust the brightness by that percentage (ex: "Role+15")
settings.usernameColor: The color to use for the username if it's not the first displayed. Leave blank for default. Accepts hex(a), rgb(a), or hsl(a) input. Use "Role" to follow the user's top role color. Use "Role+-#" to adjust the brightness by that percentage (ex: "Role+15")

silentTyping.noChanges: No changes made to silent typing settings.

settings.enabledGlobally: Toggle functionality of your own typing indicator globally.
settings.hideChatBoxTypingIndicators: Hide other users' typing indicators from above the chat bar.
settings.hideMembersListTypingIndicators: Hide other users' typing indicators from the members list.
settings.chatIcon: Show an icon in the chat bar for modifying the plugin on the go.
settings.chatIconLeftClickAction: What to do when left clicking the chat icon.
settings.chatIconMiddleClickAction: What to do when middle clicking the chat icon.
settings.chatIconRightClickAction: What to do when right clicking the chat icon.
settings.chatContextMenu: Show a dropdown in the chat context menu to modify plugin settings on the go.
settings.defaultHidden: If enabled, the plugin will hide your typing from others in any DMs/channels/guilds not listed in "Disabled Locations" below. If disabled, the plugin will show your typing to others for any DMs/channels/guilds not listed in "Enabled Locations" below.
settings.enabledLocations: Enable functionality for these IDs. Accepts a comma separated list of DM IDs, channel IDs, and guild IDs. Only used if "Default Hidden" is disabled.
settings.disabledLocations: Disable functionality for these IDs. Accepts a comma separated list of DM IDs, channel IDs, and guild IDs. Only used if "Default Hidden" is enabled.

command.description: Hide your typing indicator from chat.
command.toggleOption: Toggle functionality globally, for the channel, or for the guild.
command.chatBarIndicatorsOption: Hide other users' typing indicators from above the chat bar.
command.membersListIndicatorsOption: Hide other users' typing indicators from the members list.
command.chatIconOption: Show an icon in the chat bar for toggling the plugin on the go.
command.chatContextMenuOption: Show a dropdown in the chat context menu to toggle plugin settings on the go.
command.defaultHiddenOption: Whether to hide typing in DMs/channels/guilds by default or not.

importCustomRPC.description: Import the application id of the CustomRPC plugin to the filter list
importCustomRPC.notSet: CustomRPC application ID is not set.
importCustomRPC.alreadyAdded: CustomRPC application ID is already added.

filterList.title: Filter List
filterList.description: Comma separated list of activity IDs to filter (Useful for filtering specific RPC activities and CustomRPC)

settings.listMode: Change the mode of the filter list
settings.ignorePlaying: Ignore all playing activities (These are usually game and RPC activities)
settings.ignoreListening: Ignore all listening activities (These are usually spotify activities)
settings.ignoreCompeting: Ignore all competing activities (These are normally special game activities)

newGuildSettings.description: Automatically mute new servers and change various other settings upon joining

settings.voiceChannels: Hide names in Voice channels automatically

platformIndicators.description: Adds platform indicators (Desktop, Mobile, Web...) to users

settings.list: Show indicators in the member list
settings.colorMobileIndicator: Whether to make the mobile indicator match the color of the user status.
settings.showBots: Whether to show platform indicators on bots

mutualGroupDMs.description: Shows mutual group dms in profiles

messageLinkEmbeds.description: Adds a preview to messages that link another message

settings.messageBackgroundColor: Background color for messages in rich embeds
settings.automodEmbeds: Use automod embeds instead of rich embeds (smaller but less info)
settings.listMode: Whether to use ID list as blacklist or whitelist
settings.idList: Guild/channel/user IDs to blacklist or whitelist (separate with comma)

automodOptions.prefer: Prefer automod embeds, but use rich embeds if some content can't be shown
